features: Code snippet storage: Saves reusable code snippets with syntax highlighting.
Language support: Organizes snippets by programming language and framework.
Tag system: Categorizes snippets with tags for quick filtering and discovery.
Search functionality: Finds snippets by searching titles, tags, or code content.
Syntax highlighting: Displays code with proper highlighting for readability.
Copy to clipboard: Copies snippet code with one click for quick reuse.
Collections: Groups related snippets into collections for projects or topics.
Version history: Tracks changes to snippets with revision history.
Public sharing: Shares snippets or collections publicly via generated links.
Import and export: Migrates snippets between instances or backup data.
Markdown notes: Adds documentation and usage notes to each snippet.
Dark mode: Switches themes for comfortable coding in different lighting.
